titles.title: A resolution recognizing and honoring the first responders and those who lost their lives in the Maui wildfires in August 2023 that affected thousands of people.
A resolution recognizing and honoring the first responders and those who lost their lives in the Maui wildfires in August 2023 that affected thousands of people.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
This resolution honors the people who lost their lives in the August 2023 wildfires on the Hawaiian island of Maui and recognizes the first responders who risked their lives to respond to the wildfires.
Further, the resolution urges the people and communities of Hawaii and the United States to act diligently in preventing and preparing for wildfires.
